      • TileEngine

        public TileEngine(greenfoot.World world,
                  int tileWidth,
                  int tileHeight)
        Constuctor of the TileEngine
        Parameters:
        world - A World class or a extend of it.
        tileWidth - The width of the tile used in the TileFactory and calculations
        tileHeight - The heigth of the tile used in the TileFactory and calculations

      • TileEngine

                  int tileWidth,
                  int tileHeight,
                  int[][] map)
        Constuctor of the TileEngine
        Parameters:
        world - A World class or a extend of it.
        tileWidth - The width of the tile used in the TileFactory and calculations
        tileHeight - The heigth of the tile used in the TileFactory and calculations
        map - A tilemap with numbers

    • Method Detail

      • addTileAt

        public void addTileAt(Tile tile,
                      int colom,
                      int row)
        Adds a tile on the colom and row. Calculation is based on TILE_WIDTH and TILE_HEIGHT
        Parameters:
        tile - The Tile
        colom - The colom where the tile exist in the map
        row - The row where the tile exist in the map

      • checkTileSolid

        public boolean checkTileSolid(int x,
                              int y)
        This methode checks if a tile on a x and y position in the world is solid or not.
        Parameters:
        x - X-position in the world
        y - Y-position in the world
        Returns:
        Tile at location is solid

        public Tile getTileAt(int colom,
                      int row)
        Retrieves a tile at the location based on colom and row in the map
        Parameters:
        colom -
        row -
        Returns:
        The tile at the location colom and row. Returns null if it cannot find a tile.

        public void setMap(int[][] map)

      • setTileFactory

        public void setTileFactory(TileFactory tf)
        The setTileFactory sets a tilefactory. You can use this if you want to create you own tilefacory and use it in the class.
        Parameters:
        tf - A Tilefactory or extend of it.
